config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The iosCreateImagesetFolders configuration option is used to determine whether to create an imageset folder for iOS images. If the option is enabled, a new folder with the target image file name suffixed with ".imageset" is created inside the destination folder. If the option is disabled, a default ROOT_FOLDER is used instead.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The iosCreateImagesetFolders configuration is triggered multiple times during the image processing tasks, specifically when creating folders for iOS images and when cleaning up the folders after processing.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: Enabling the iosCreateImagesetFolders configuration option results in the creation of additional imageset folders for iOS images, which can impact the overall size and structure of the output directory. Disabling the option will use a default folder structure instead.
